The first is that Apple is developing accessories that could enable new iPads and iPhones to communicate using NFC( near-field communications) technology. iLounge reported: In the most basic implementation, an accessory could announce its presence and potential functions to an iPad or iPhone without the need for a Bluetooth or similar connection; our source suggests that an otherwise simple case could include a radio chip so that an inserted iPhone or iPad could go into power-saving hibernation mode automatically. More complex accessories will go far beyond that.
